mil.emp3.api.utils

Class GeoLibrary

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.emp3.api.utils.GeoLibrary

  • public class GeoLibrary
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provide utility function for geospatial computations.

      • isLeft

        public static boolean isLeft(IGeoPosition p1,
                             IGeoPosition p2,
                             IGeoPosition p3)

        Parameters:
        p1 - the first point of the line
        p2 - the second point of the line
        p3 - the point to test
        Returns:
        true if p3 is on the left side of the line, false otherwise

      • intersection

        public static IGeoPosition intersection(IGeoPosition p1,
                                        double brng1,
                                        IGeoPosition p2,
                                        double brng2)
        http://www.movable-type.co.uk/scripts/latlong.html Returns the point of intersection of two paths defined by point and bearing.
        Parameters:
        {LatLon} - p1 - First point.
        {number} - brng1 - Initial bearing from first point.
        {LatLon} - p2 - Second point.
        {number} - brng2 - Initial bearing from second point.

        Returns:
